        Email display settings<h2>Email display settings</h2>

        There is a setting<a href="/hosting/settings">setting</a> to control how
        your email address appears on comments and issues that you post.<p>There is a <a href="/hosting/settings">setting</a> to control how
        your email address appears on comments and issues that you post.</p>

        Project members will always see your full email address.  By
        default, other users who visit the site will see an
        abbreviated version of your email address.<p>Project members will always see your full email address.  By
        default, other users who visit the site will see an
        abbreviated version of your email address.</p>

        If you do not wish your email address to be shared, there
        are other ways to get
        involved<a href="http://www.chromium.org/getting-involved">get
        involved</a> in the community.  To report a problem when using
        the Chrome browser, you may use the "Report an issue..."  item
        on the "Help" menu.<p>If you do not wish your email address to be shared, there
        are other ways to <a href="http://www.chromium.org/getting-involved">get
        involved</a> in the community.  To report a problem when using
        the Chrome browser, you may use the "Report an issue..."  item
        on the "Help" menu.</p>


        
          
      
        <slot></slot>
      <button>
        <slot></slot>
      </button>
    
            Got it
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        <div class="edit-actions">
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        </div>
      <chops-dialog id="privacyDialog" forced="">
        <h2>Email display settings</h2>

        <p>There is a <a href="/hosting/settings">setting</a> to control how
        your email address appears on comments and issues that you post.</p>

        <p>Project members will always see your full email address.  By
        default, other users who visit the site will see an
        abbreviated version of your email address.</p>

        <p>If you do not wish your email address to be shared, there
        are other ways to <a href="http://www.chromium.org/getting-involved">get
        involved</a> in the community.  To report a problem when using
        the Chrome browser, you may use the "Report an issue..."  item
        on the "Help" menu.</p>


        <div class="edit-actions">
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        </div>
      </chops-dialog>

      
      
        
          <slot></slot>
        <div class="dialog-content">
          <slot></slot>
        </div>
      <dialog class="dialog" role="dialog">
        <div class="dialog-content">
          <slot></slot>
        </div>
      </dialog>
    
        This site hosts public issues in public projects<h2>This site hosts public issues in public projects</h2>

        Unlike our internal issue tracker, this site makes most
        issues public, unless the issue is labeled with a Restrict-View-*
        label, such as Restrict-View-Google.<p>Unlike our internal issue tracker, this site makes most
        issues public, unless the issue is labeled with a Restrict-View-*
        label, such as Restrict-View-Google.</p>

        Components are not used for permissions.  And, regardless of
        restriction labels, the issue reporter, owner,
        and Cc'd users may always view the issue.<p>Components are not used for permissions.  And, regardless of
        restriction labels, the issue reporter, owner,
        and Cc'd users may always view the issue.</p>

        

        
          
      
        <slot></slot>
      <button>
        <slot></slot>
      </button>
    
            Got it
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        <div class="edit-actions">
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        </div>
      <chops-dialog id="corpModeDialog" forced="">
        <h2>This site hosts public issues in public projects</h2>

        <p>Unlike our internal issue tracker, this site makes most
        issues public, unless the issue is labeled with a Restrict-View-*
        label, such as Restrict-View-Google.</p>

        <p>Components are not used for permissions.  And, regardless of
        restriction labels, the issue reporter, owner,
        and Cc'd users may always view the issue.</p>

        

        <div class="edit-actions">
          <chops-button>
            Got it
          </chops-button>
        </div>
      </chops-dialog>

      VULNERABILITY DETAILS<b class="line"><!---->VULNERABILITY DETAILS<!----></b><br><br>When |ChromePasswordManagerClient| listens to the paste event, it will call |ReadText|[1]. And |ReadText| will run a nested message loop[2] to continue running the ui thread. If |ChromePasswordManagerClient| are destroyed, the UAF will be triggered when accessing its member variables[3] after the nested message loops exit. (Asan throw it out as heap-buffer-overflow)<span class="line"><!---->When |ChromePasswordManagerClient| listens to the paste event, it will call |ReadText|[1]. And |ReadText| will run a nested message loop[2] to continue running the ui thread. If |ChromePasswordManagerClient| are destroyed, the UAF will be triggered when accessing its member variables[3] after the nested message loops exit. (Asan throw it out as heap-buffer-overflow)<!----></span><br><br>[1]. <span class="line"><!---->[1]. <!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:chrome/browser/password_manager/chrome_password_manager_client.cc;l=1344;drc=00053fb4d880a925c890193b74a8ff35e1cef2a0<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:chrome/browser/password_manager/chrome_password_manager_client.cc;l=1344;drc=00053fb4d880a925c890193b74a8ff35e1cef2a0"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:chrome/browser/password_manager/chrome_password_manager_client.cc;l=1344;drc=00053fb4d880a925c890193b74a8ff35e1cef2a0<!----></a><br>[2]. <span class="line"><!---->[2]. <!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:ui/base/x/selection_requestor.cc;l=249;drc=eafec8441d8c6343f3d23a05a72da5835f4c87e4<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:ui/base/x/selection_requestor.cc;l=249;drc=eafec8441d8c6343f3d23a05a72da5835f4c87e4"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:ui/base/x/selection_requestor.cc;l=249;drc=eafec8441d8c6343f3d23a05a72da5835f4c87e4<!----></a><br>[3]. <span class="line"><!---->[3]. <!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:chrome/browser/password_manager/chrome_password_manager_client.cc;l=1347;drc=00053fb4d880a925c890193b74a8ff35e1cef2a0<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:chrome/browser/password_manager/chrome_password_manager_client.cc;l=1347;drc=00053fb4d880a925c890193b74a8ff35e1cef2a0"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:chrome/browser/password_manager/chrome_password_manager_client.cc;l=1347;drc=00053fb4d880a925c890193b74a8ff35e1cef2a0<!----></a><br><br><br>VERSION<b class="line"><!---->VERSION<!----></b><br>Chrome Version: stable<span class="line"><!---->Chrome Version: stable<!----></span><br>Operating System: Linux<span class="line"><!---->Operating System: Linux<!----></span><br><br><br>REPRODUCTION CASE<b class="line"><!---->REPRODUCTION CASE<!----></b><br>1. Copy a lot of content(I used about 300M) from a non-chrome window.<span class="line"><!---->1. Copy a lot of content(I used about 300M) from a non-chrome window.<!----></span><br>2. $ python -m SimpleHTTPServer<span class="line"><!---->2. $ python -m SimpleHTTPServer<!----></span><br>   $ out/asan/chrome --user-data-dir=/tmp/xxxx "<span class="line"><!---->   $ out/asan/chrome --user-data-dir=/tmp/xxxx "<!----></span>http://localhost:8000/poc.html<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="http://localhost:8000/poc.html"><!---->http://localhost:8000/poc.html<!----></a>"<span class="line"><!---->"<!----></span><br>3. Click the input field and press Ctrl-V to paste.<span class="line"><!---->3. Click the input field and press Ctrl-V to paste.<!----></span><br><br><br>FOR CRASHES, PLEASE INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING ADDITIONAL INFORMATION<b class="line"><!---->FOR CRASHES, PLEASE INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING ADDITIONAL INFORMATION<!----></b><br>Type of crash: browser<span class="line"><!---->Type of crash: browser<!----></span><br>Crash State: see asan file<span class="line"><!---->Crash State: see asan file<!----></span><br><br><br>CREDIT INFORMATION<b class="line"><!---->CREDIT INFORMATION<!----></b><br>Reporter credit: Leecraso and Guang Gong of 360 Alpha Lab<span class="line"><!---->Reporter credit: Leecraso and Guang Gong of 360 Alpha Lab<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        Thanks ajgo@, I'll see if there's an easy fix. <span class="line"><!---->Thanks ajgo@, I'll see if there's an easy fix. <!----></span><br><br>> See <span class="line"><!---->&gt; See <!----></span>https://bugs.chromium.org/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1161146#c5<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://bugs.chromium.org/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1161146#c5"><!---->https://bugs.chromium.org/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1161146#c5<!----></a> for an example of how an attacker could manipulate the clipboard to make this exploitable. The process is somewhat convoluted so while this is accessible from a web context it will be difficult to exploit, so setting severity=High.<span class="line"><!----> for an example of how an attacker could manipulate the clipboard to make this exploitable.         The content of <span class="line"><!---->The content of <!----></span>https://bugs.chromium.org/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1161146#c5<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://bugs.chromium.org/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1161146#c5"><!---->https://bugs.chromium.org/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1161146#c5<!----></a> :<span class="line"><!----> :<!----></span><br><br> >    The nested message loop occurs in the pasting between different windows, so you can first use the mojo interface of the clipboard to fill the clipboard, and then close the browser (which can be achieved through window.close() or some crash). When the user restarts the browser, the browser is in a different window, so you can continue Step3.<span class="line"><!----> &gt;    The nested message loop occurs in the pasting between different windows, so you can first use the mojo interface of the clipboard to fill the clipboard, and then close the browser (which can be achieved through window.close() or some crash).         This bug requires manual review: We are only 3 days from stable.<span class="line"><!---->This bug requires manual review: We are only 3 days from stable.<!----></span><br>Before a merge request will be considered, the following information is required to be added to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->Before a merge request will be considered, the following information is required to be added to this bug:<!----></span><br><br>1. Does your merge fit within the Merge Decision Guidelines?<span class="line"><!---->1. Does your merge fit within the Merge Decision Guidelines?<!----></span><br>- Chrome: <span class="line"><!---->- Chrome: <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge<!----></a><br>- Chrome OS: <span class="line"><!---->- Chrome OS: <!----></span>https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines"><!---->https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines<!----></a><br>2. Links to the CLs you are requesting to merge.<span class="line"><!---->2. Links to the CLs you are requesting to merge.<!----></span><br>3. Has the change landed and been verified on ToT?<span class="line"><!---->3. Has the change landed and been verified on ToT?<!----></span><br>4. Does this change need to be merged into other active release branches (M-1, M+1)?<span class="line"><!---->4. Does this change need to be merged into other active release branches (M-1, M+1)?<!----></span><br>5. Why are these changes required in this milestone after branch?<span class="line"><!---->5. Why are these changes required in this milestone after branch?<!----></span><br>6. Is this a new feature?<span class="line"><!---->6. Is this a new feature?<!----></span><br>7. If it is a new feature, is it behind a flag using finch?<span class="line"><!---->7. If it is a new feature, is it behind a flag using finch?<!----></span><br><br>Chrome OS Only:<span class="line"><!---->Chrome OS Only:<!----></span><br>8. Was the change reviewed and approved by the Eng Prod Representative? See Eng Prod ownership by component: <span class="line"><!---->8. Was the change reviewed and approved by the Eng Prod Representative? See Eng Prod ownership by component: <!----></span>http://go/cros-engprodcomponents<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="http://go/cros-engprodcomponents"><!---->http://go/cros-engprodcomponents<!----></a><br><br>Please contact the milestone owner if you have questions.<span class="line"><!---->Please contact the milestone owner if you have questions.<!----></span><br>Owners: govind@(Android), bindusuvarna@(iOS), marinakz@(ChromeOS), srinivassista @(Desktop)<span class="line"><!---->Owners: govind@(Android), bindusuvarna@(iOS), marinakz@(ChromeOS), srinivassista @(Desktop)<!----></span><br><br>For more details visit <span class="line"><!---->For more details visit <!----></span>https://www.chromium.org/issue-tracking/autotriage<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://www.chromium.org/issue-tracking/autotriage"><!---->https://www.chromium.org/issue-tracking/autotriage<!----></a> - Your friendly Sheriffbot<span class="line"><!----> - Your friendly Sheriffbot<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

    <mr-issue-details class="main-item"><!---->
      <style>
        mr-issue-details {
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          background-color: var(--chops-white);
          padding-bottom: 1em;
          display: flex;
          align-items: stretch;
          justify-content: flex-start;
          flex-direction: column;
          margin: 0;
          box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        h3 {

        Description #1 by leecraso@gmail.com (Dec 22, 2020)

      VULNERABILITY DETAILS<b class="line"><!---->VULNERABILITY DETAILS<!----></b><br><br>When |ChromePasswordManagerClient| listens to the paste event, it will call |ReadText|[1]. And |ReadText| will run a nested message loop[2] to continue running the ui thread. If |ChromePasswordManagerClient| are destroyed, the UAF will be triggered when accessing its member variables[3] after the nested message loops exit. (Asan throw it out as heap-buffer-overflow)<span class="line"><!---->When |ChromePasswordManagerClient| listens to the paste event, it will call |ReadText|[1]. And |ReadText| will run a nested message loop[2] to continue running the ui thread. If |ChromePasswordManagerClient| are destroyed, the UAF will be triggered when accessing its member variables[3] after the nested message loops exit. (Asan throw it out as heap-buffer-overflow)<!----></span><br><br>[1]. <span class="line"><!---->[1]. <!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:chrome/browser/password_manager/chrome_password_manager_client.cc;l=1344;drc=00053fb4d880a925c890193b74a8ff35e1cef2a0<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:chrome/browser/password_manager/chrome_password_manager_client.cc;l=1344;drc=00053fb4d880a925c890193b74a8ff35e1cef2a0"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:chrome/browser/password_manager/chrome_password_manager_client.cc;l=1344;drc=00053fb4d880a925c890193b74a8ff35e1cef2a0<!----></a><br>[2]. <span class="line"><!---->[2]. <!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:ui/base/x/selection_requestor.cc;l=249;drc=eafec8441d8c6343f3d23a05a72da5835f4c87e4<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:ui/base/x/selection_requestor.cc;l=249;drc=eafec8441d8c6343f3d23a05a72da5835f4c87e4"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:ui/base/x/selection_requestor.cc;l=249;drc=eafec8441d8c6343f3d23a05a72da5835f4c87e4<!----></a><br>[3]. <span class="line"><!---->[3]. <!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:chrome/browser/password_manager/chrome_password_manager_client.cc;l=1347;drc=00053fb4d880a925c890193b74a8ff35e1cef2a0<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:chrome/browser/password_manager/chrome_password_manager_client.cc;l=1347;drc=00053fb4d880a925c890193b74a8ff35e1cef2a0"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:chrome/browser/password_manager/chrome_password_manager_client.cc;l=1347;drc=00053fb4d880a925c890193b74a8ff35e1cef2a0<!----></a><br><br><br>VERSION<b class="line"><!---->VERSION<!----></b><br>Chrome Version: stable<span class="line"><!---->Chrome Version: stable<!----></span><br>Operating System: Linux<span class="line"><!---->Operating System: Linux<!----></span><br><br><br>REPRODUCTION CASE<b class="line"><!---->REPRODUCTION CASE<!----></b><br>1. Copy a lot of content(I used about 300M) from a non-chrome window.<span class="line"><!---->1. Copy a lot of content(I used about 300M) from a non-chrome window.<!----></span><br>2. $ python -m SimpleHTTPServer<span class="line"><!---->2. $ python -m SimpleHTTPServer<!----></span><br>   $ out/asan/chrome --user-data-dir=/tmp/xxxx "<span class="line"><!---->   $ out/asan/chrome --user-data-dir=/tmp/xxxx "<!----></span>http://localhost:8000/poc.html<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="http://localhost:8000/poc.html"><!---->http://localhost:8000/poc.html<!----></a>"<span class="line"><!---->"<!----></span><br>3. Click the input field and press Ctrl-V to paste.<span class="line"><!---->3. Click the input field and press Ctrl-V to paste.<!----></span><br><br><br>FOR CRASHES, PLEASE INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING ADDITIONAL INFORMATION<b class="line"><!---->FOR CRASHES, PLEASE INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING ADDITIONAL INFORMATION<!----></b><br>Type of crash: browser<span class="line"><!---->Type of crash: browser<!----></span><br>Crash State: see asan file<span class="line"><!---->Crash State: see asan file<!----></span><br><br><br>CREDIT INFORMATION<b class="line"><!---->CREDIT INFORMATION<!----></b><br>Reporter credit: Leecraso and Guang Gong of 360 Alpha Lab<span class="line"><!---->Reporter credit: Leecraso and Guang Gong of 360 Alpha Lab<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        leecraso: I'm likely to mark this as non-security as it requires pasting 300MB into the omnibox. Please let me know if this can be controlled from a web context.<span class="line"><!---->leecraso: I'm likely to mark this as non-security as it requires pasting 300MB into the omnibox.         The content of <span class="line"><!---->The content of <!----></span>https://bugs.chromium.org/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1161146#c5<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://bugs.chromium.org/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1161146#c5"><!---->https://bugs.chromium.org/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1161146#c5<!----></a> :<span class="line"><!----> :<!----></span><br><br> >    The nested message loop occurs in the pasting between different windows, so you can first use the mojo interface of the clipboard to fill the clipboard, and then close the browser (which can be achieved through window.close() or some crash). When the user restarts the browser, the browser is in a different window, so you can continue Step3.<span class="line"><!----> &gt;    The nested message loop occurs in the pasting between different windows, so you can first use the mojo interface of the clipboard to fill the clipboard, and then close the browser (which can be achieved through window.close() or some crash). When the user restarts the browser, the browser is in a different window, so you can continue Step3.<!----></span><br><br>        $ python ./copy_mojo_js_bindings.py /path/to/chrome/.../out/asan/gen<span class="line"><!---->        $ python ./copy_mojo_js_bindings.py /path/to/chrome/.../out/asan/gen<!----></span><br>        $ python -m SimpleHTTPServer<span class="line"><!---->        $ python -m SimpleHTTPServer<!----></span><br><br>        $ out/asan/chrome --enable-blink-features=MojoJS --user-data-dir=/tmp/xxxx "<span class="line"><!---->        $ out/asan/chrome --enable-blink-features=MojoJS --user-data-dir=/tmp/xxxx "<!----></span>http://localhost:8000/poc_with_clipboard.html<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="http://localhost:8000/poc_with_clipboard.html"><!---->http://localhost:8000/poc_with_clipboard.html<!----></a>"<span class="line"><!---->"<!----></span><br>        $ out/asan/chrome --enable-blink-features=MojoJS --user-data-dir=/tmp/xxxx "<span class="line"><!---->        $ out/asan/chrome --enable-blink-features=MojoJS --user-data-dir=/tmp/xxxx "<!----></span>http://localhost:8000/poc_with_clipboard.html<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="http://localhost:8000/poc_with_clipboard.html"><!---->http://localhost:8000/poc_with_clipboard.html<!----></a>"<span class="line"><!---->"<!----></span><br><br>And about this issue:<span class="line"><!---->And about this issue:<!----></span><br>Then press Ctrl-V several times to paste into the input field. <span class="line"><!---->Then press Ctrl-V several times to paste into the input field. <!----></span><br>(Sometimes window.close() may not work, you need to close the tab manually.)<span class="line"><!---->(Sometimes window.close() may not work, you need to close the tab manually.)<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>
        
          
            
      
        
          
          copy_mojo_js_bindings.py<b><!---->copy_mojo_js_bindings.py<!----></b>
          
        <div class="filename">
          
          <b><!---->copy_mojo_js_bindings.py<!----></b>

        Description #1 by leecraso@gmail.com (Dec 22, 2020)

      VULNERABILITY DETAILS<b class="line"><!---->VULNERABILITY DETAILS<!----></b><br><br>When |ChromePasswordManagerClient| listens to the paste event, it will call |ReadText|[1]. And |ReadText| will run a nested message loop[2] to continue running the ui thread. If |ChromePasswordManagerClient| are destroyed, the UAF will be triggered when accessing its member variables[3] after the nested message loops exit. (Asan throw it out as heap-buffer-overflow)<span class="line"><!---->When |ChromePasswordManagerClient| listens to the paste event, it will call |ReadText|[1]. And |ReadText| will run a nested message loop[2] to continue running the ui thread. If |ChromePasswordManagerClient| are destroyed, the UAF will be triggered when accessing its member variables[3] after the nested message loops exit. (Asan throw it out as heap-buffer-overflow)<!----></span><br><br>[1]. <span class="line"><!---->[1]. <!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:chrome/browser/password_manager/chrome_password_manager_client.cc;l=1344;drc=00053fb4d880a925c890193b74a8ff35e1cef2a0<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:chrome/browser/password_manager/chrome_password_manager_client.cc;l=1344;drc=00053fb4d880a925c890193b74a8ff35e1cef2a0"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:chrome/browser/password_manager/chrome_password_manager_client.cc;l=1344;drc=00053fb4d880a925c890193b74a8ff35e1cef2a0<!----></a><br>[2]. <span class="line"><!---->[2]. <!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:ui/base/x/selection_requestor.cc;l=249;drc=eafec8441d8c6343f3d23a05a72da5835f4c87e4<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:ui/base/x/selection_requestor.cc;l=249;drc=eafec8441d8c6343f3d23a05a72da5835f4c87e4"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:ui/base/x/selection_requestor.cc;l=249;drc=eafec8441d8c6343f3d23a05a72da5835f4c87e4<!----></a><br>[3]. <span class="line"><!---->[3]. <!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:chrome/browser/password_manager/chrome_password_manager_client.cc;l=1347;drc=00053fb4d880a925c890193b74a8ff35e1cef2a0<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:chrome/browser/password_manager/chrome_password_manager_client.cc;l=1347;drc=00053fb4d880a925c890193b74a8ff35e1cef2a0"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:chrome/browser/password_manager/chrome_password_manager_client.cc;l=1347;drc=00053fb4d880a925c890193b74a8ff35e1cef2a0<!----></a><br><br><br>VERSION<b class="line"><!---->VERSION<!----></b><br>Chrome Version: stable<span class="line"><!---->Chrome Version: stable<!----></span><br>Operating System: Linux<span class="line"><!---->Operating System: Linux<!----></span><br><br><br>REPRODUCTION CASE<b class="line"><!---->REPRODUCTION CASE<!----></b><br>1. Copy a lot of content(I used about 300M) from a non-chrome window.<span class="line"><!---->1. Copy a lot of content(I used about 300M) from a non-chrome window.<!----></span><br>2. $ python -m SimpleHTTPServer<span class="line"><!---->2. $ python -m SimpleHTTPServer<!----></span><br>   $ out/asan/chrome --user-data-dir=/tmp/xxxx "<span class="line"><!---->   $ out/asan/chrome --user-data-dir=/tmp/xxxx "<!----></span>http://localhost:8000/poc.html<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="http://localhost:8000/poc.html"><!---->http://localhost:8000/poc.html<!----></a>"<span class="line"><!---->"<!----></span><br>3. Click the input field and press Ctrl-V to paste.<span class="line"><!---->3. Click the input field and press Ctrl-V to paste.<!----></span><br><br><br>FOR CRASHES, PLEASE INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING ADDITIONAL INFORMATION<b class="line"><!---->FOR CRASHES, PLEASE INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING ADDITIONAL INFORMATION<!----></b><br>Type of crash: browser<span class="line"><!---->Type of crash: browser<!----></span><br>Crash State: see asan file<span class="line"><!---->Crash State: see asan file<!----></span><br><br><br>CREDIT INFORMATION<b class="line"><!---->CREDIT INFORMATION<!----></b><br>Reporter credit: Leecraso and Guang Gong of 360 Alpha Lab<span class="line"><!---->Reporter credit: Leecraso and Guang Gong of 360 Alpha Lab<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        leecraso: I'm likely to mark this as non-security as it requires pasting 300MB into the omnibox. Please let me know if this can be controlled from a web context.<span class="line"><!---->leecraso: I'm likely to mark this as non-security as it requires pasting 300MB into the omnibox. Please let me know if this can be controlled from a web context.<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        by
        <mr-user-link></mr-user-link>
        on
        <chops-timestamp title="Wed, Jan 13, 2021, 5:40 AM EST"></chops-timestamp>

      <div role="heading" class="comment-header" aria-level="2">
        <div>
          <a class="comment-link" href="?id=1161147#c9">Comment 9<!----></a>

          
        by
        <mr-user-link></mr-user-link>
        on
        <chops-timestamp title="Wed, Jan 13, 2021, 5:40 AM EST"></chops-timestamp>
        
      
        </div>

        The content of <span class="line"><!---->The content of <!----></span>https://bugs.chromium.org/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1161146#c5<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://bugs.chromium.org/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1161146#c5"><!---->https://bugs.chromium.org/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1161146#c5<!----></a> :<span class="line"><!----> :<!----></span><br><br> >    The nested message loop occurs in the pasting between different windows, so you can first use the mojo interface of the clipboard to fill the clipboard, and then close the browser (which can be achieved through window.close() or some crash). When the user restarts the browser, the browser is in a different window, so you can continue Step3.<span class="line"><!----> &gt;    The nested message loop occurs in the pasting between different windows, so you can first use the mojo interface of the clipboard to fill the clipboard, and then close the browser (which can be achieved through window.close() or some crash).         This bug requires manual review: We are only 3 days from stable.<span class="line"><!---->This bug requires manual review: We are only 3 days from stable.<!----></span><br>Before a merge request will be considered, the following information is required to be added to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->Before a merge request will be considered, the following information is required to be added to this bug:<!----></span><br><br>1. Does your merge fit within the Merge Decision Guidelines?<span class="line"><!---->1. Does your merge fit within the Merge Decision Guidelines?<!----></span><br>- Chrome: <span class="line"><!---->- Chrome: <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge<!----></a><br>- Chrome OS: <span class="line"><!---->- Chrome OS: <!----></span>https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines"><!---->https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines<!----></a><br>2. Links to the CLs you are requesting to merge.<span class="line"><!---->2. Links to the CLs you are requesting to merge.<!----></span><br>3. Has the change landed and been verified on ToT?<span class="line"><!---->3. Has the change landed and been verified on ToT?<!----></span><br>4. Does this change need to be merged into other active release branches (M-1, M+1)?<span class="line"><!---->4. Does this change need to be merged into other active release branches (M-1, M+1)?<!----></span><br>5. Why are these changes required in this milestone after branch?<span class="line"><!---->5. Why are these changes required in this milestone after branch?<!----></span><br>6. Is this a new feature?<span class="line"><!---->6. Is this a new feature?<!----></span><br>7. If it is a new feature, is it behind a flag using finch?<span class="line"><!---->7. If it is a new feature, is it behind a flag using finch?<!----></span><br><br>Chrome OS Only:<span class="line"><!---->Chrome OS Only:<!----></span><br>8. Was the change reviewed and approved by the Eng Prod Representative? See Eng Prod ownership by component: <span class="line"><!---->8. Was the change reviewed and approved by the Eng Prod Representative? See Eng Prod ownership by component: <!----></span>http://go/cros-engprodcomponents<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="http://go/cros-engprodcomponents"><!---->http://go/cros-engprodcomponents<!----></a><br><br>Please contact the milestone owner if you have questions.<span class="line"><!---->Please contact the milestone owner if you have questions.<!----></span><br>Owners: govind@(Android), bindusuvarna@(iOS), marinakz@(ChromeOS), srinivassista @(Desktop)<span class="line"><!---->Owners: govind@(Android), bindusuvarna@(iOS), marinakz@(ChromeOS), srinivassista @(Desktop)<!----></span><br><br>For more details visit <span class="line"><!---->For more details visit <!----></span>https://www.chromium.org/issue-tracking/autotriage<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://www.chromium.org/issue-tracking/autotriage"><!---->https://www.chromium.org/issue-tracking/autotriage<!----></a> - Your friendly Sheriffbot<span class="line"><!----> - Your friendly Sheriffbot<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

          box-sizing: border-box;
        }
        h3 {
          margin-top: 1em;
        }
        mr-description {
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        mr-edit-issue {
          margin-top: 40px;
        }
      </style>
      <mr-description></mr-description>

      VULNERABILITY DETAILS<b class="line"><!---->VULNERABILITY DETAILS<!----></b><br><br>When |ChromePasswordManagerClient| listens to the paste event, it will call |ReadText|[1]. And |ReadText| will run a nested message loop[2] to continue running the ui thread. If |ChromePasswordManagerClient| are destroyed, the UAF will be triggered when accessing its member variables[3] after the nested message loops exit. (Asan throw it out as heap-buffer-overflow)<span class="line"><!---->When |ChromePasswordManagerClient| listens to the paste event, it will call |ReadText|[1]. And |ReadText| will run a nested message loop[2] to continue running the ui thread. If |ChromePasswordManagerClient| are destroyed, the UAF will be triggered when accessing its member variables[3] after the nested message loops exit. (Asan throw it out as heap-buffer-overflow)<!----></span><br><br>[1]. <span class="line"><!---->[1]. <!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:chrome/browser/password_manager/chrome_password_manager_client.cc;l=1344;drc=00053fb4d880a925c890193b74a8ff35e1cef2a0<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:chrome/browser/password_manager/chrome_password_manager_client.cc;l=1344;drc=00053fb4d880a925c890193b74a8ff35e1cef2a0"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:chrome/browser/password_manager/chrome_password_manager_client.cc;l=1344;drc=00053fb4d880a925c890193b74a8ff35e1cef2a0<!----></a><br>[2]. <span class="line"><!---->[2]. <!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:ui/base/x/selection_requestor.cc;l=249;drc=eafec8441d8c6343f3d23a05a72da5835f4c87e4<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:ui/base/x/selection_requestor.cc;l=249;drc=eafec8441d8c6343f3d23a05a72da5835f4c87e4"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:ui/base/x/selection_requestor.cc;l=249;drc=eafec8441d8c6343f3d23a05a72da5835f4c87e4<!----></a><br>[3]. <span class="line"><!---->[3]. <!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:chrome/browser/password_manager/chrome_password_manager_client.cc;l=1347;drc=00053fb4d880a925c890193b74a8ff35e1cef2a0<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:chrome/browser/password_manager/chrome_password_manager_client.cc;l=1347;drc=00053fb4d880a925c890193b74a8ff35e1cef2a0"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:chrome/browser/password_manager/chrome_password_manager_client.cc;l=1347;drc=00053fb4d880a925c890193b74a8ff35e1cef2a0<!----></a><br><br><br>VERSION<b class="line"><!---->VERSION<!----></b><br>Chrome Version: stable<span class="line"><!---->Chrome Version: stable<!----></span><br>Operating System: Linux<span class="line"><!---->Operating System: Linux<!----></span><br><br><br>REPRODUCTION CASE<b class="line"><!---->REPRODUCTION CASE<!----></b><br>1. Copy a lot of content(I used about 300M) from a non-chrome window.<span class="line"><!---->1. Copy a lot of content(I used about 300M) from a non-chrome window.<!----></span><br>2. $ python -m SimpleHTTPServer<span class="line"><!---->2. $ python -m SimpleHTTPServer<!----></span><br>   $ out/asan/chrome --user-data-dir=/tmp/xxxx "<span class="line"><!---->   $ out/asan/chrome --user-data-dir=/tmp/xxxx "<!----></span>http://localhost:8000/poc.html<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="http://localhost:8000/poc.html"><!---->http://localhost:8000/poc.html<!----></a>"<span class="line"><!---->"<!----></span><br>3. Click the input field and press Ctrl-V to paste.<span class="line"><!---->3. Click the input field and press Ctrl-V to paste.<!----></span><br><br><br>FOR CRASHES, PLEASE INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING ADDITIONAL INFORMATION<b class="line"><!---->FOR CRASHES, PLEASE INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING ADDITIONAL INFORMATION<!----></b><br>Type of crash: browser<span class="line"><!---->Type of crash: browser<!----></span><br>Crash State: see asan file<span class="line"><!---->Crash State: see asan file<!----></span><br><br><br>CREDIT INFORMATION<b class="line"><!---->CREDIT INFORMATION<!----></b><br>Reporter credit: Leecraso and Guang Gong of 360 Alpha Lab<span class="line"><!---->Reporter credit: Leecraso and Guang Gong of 360 Alpha Lab<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        by

        The content of <span class="line"><!---->The content of <!----></span>https://bugs.chromium.org/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1161146#c5<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://bugs.chromium.org/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1161146#c5"><!---->https://bugs.chromium.org/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1161146#c5<!----></a> :<span class="line"><!----> :<!----></span><br><br> >    The nested message loop occurs in the pasting between different windows, so you can first use the mojo interface of the clipboard to fill the clipboard, and then close the browser (which can be achieved through window.close() or some crash). When the user restarts the browser, the browser is in a different window, so you can continue Step3.<span class="line"><!----> &gt;    The nested message loop occurs in the pasting between different windows, so you can first use the mojo interface of the clipboard to fill the clipboard, and then close the browser (which can be achieved through window.close() or some crash). When the user restarts the browser, the browser is in a different window, so you can continue Step3.<!----></span><br><br>        $ python ./copy_mojo_js_bindings.py /path/to/chrome/.../out/asan/gen<span class="line"><!---->        $ python ./copy_mojo_js_bindings.py /path/to/chrome/.../out/asan/gen<!----></span><br>        $ python -m SimpleHTTPServer<span class="line"><!---->        $ python -m SimpleHTTPServer<!----></span><br><br>        $ out/asan/chrome --enable-blink-features=MojoJS --user-data-dir=/tmp/xxxx "<span class="line"><!---->        $ out/asan/chrome --enable-blink-features=MojoJS --user-data-dir=/tmp/xxxx "<!----></span>http://localhost:8000/poc_with_clipboard.html<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="http://localhost:8000/poc_with_clipboard.html"><!---->http://localhost:8000/poc_with_clipboard.html<!----></a>"<span class="line"><!---->"<!----></span><br>        $ out/asan/chrome --enable-blink-features=MojoJS --user-data-dir=/tmp/xxxx "<span class="line"><!---->        $ out/asan/chrome --enable-blink-features=MojoJS --user-data-dir=/tmp/xxxx "<!----></span>http://localhost:8000/poc_with_clipboard.html<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="http://localhost:8000/poc_with_clipboard.html"><!---->http://localhost:8000/poc_with_clipboard.html<!----></a>"<span class="line"><!---->"<!----></span><br><br>And about this issue:<span class="line"><!---->And about this issue:<!----></span><br>Then press Ctrl-V several times to paste into the input field. <span class="line"><!---->Then press Ctrl-V several times to paste into the input field. <!----></span><br>(Sometimes window.close() may not work, you need to close the tab manually.)<span class="line"><!---->(Sometimes window.close() may not work, you need to close the tab manually.)<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

      VULNERABILITY DETAILS<b class="line"><!---->VULNERABILITY DETAILS<!----></b><br><br>When |ChromePasswordManagerClient| listens to the paste event, it will call |ReadText|[1]. And |ReadText| will run a nested message loop[2] to continue running the ui thread. If |ChromePasswordManagerClient| are destroyed, the UAF will be triggered when accessing its member variables[3] after the nested message loops exit. (Asan throw it out as heap-buffer-overflow)<span class="line"><!---->When |ChromePasswordManagerClient| listens to the paste event, it will call |ReadText|[1]. And |ReadText| will run a nested message loop[2] to continue running the ui thread. If |ChromePasswordManagerClient| are destroyed, the UAF will be triggered when accessing its member variables[3] after the nested message loops exit. (Asan throw it out as heap-buffer-overflow)<!----></span><br><br>[1]. <span class="line"><!---->[1]. <!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:chrome/browser/password_manager/chrome_password_manager_client.cc;l=1344;drc=00053fb4d880a925c890193b74a8ff35e1cef2a0<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:chrome/browser/password_manager/chrome_password_manager_client.cc;l=1344;drc=00053fb4d880a925c890193b74a8ff35e1cef2a0"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:chrome/browser/password_manager/chrome_password_manager_client.cc;l=1344;drc=00053fb4d880a925c890193b74a8ff35e1cef2a0<!----></a><br>[2]. <span class="line"><!---->[2]. <!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:ui/base/x/selection_requestor.cc;l=249;drc=eafec8441d8c6343f3d23a05a72da5835f4c87e4<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:ui/base/x/selection_requestor.cc;l=249;drc=eafec8441d8c6343f3d23a05a72da5835f4c87e4"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:ui/base/x/selection_requestor.cc;l=249;drc=eafec8441d8c6343f3d23a05a72da5835f4c87e4<!----></a><br>[3]. <span class="line"><!---->[3]. <!----></span>https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:chrome/browser/password_manager/chrome_password_manager_client.cc;l=1347;drc=00053fb4d880a925c890193b74a8ff35e1cef2a0<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:chrome/browser/password_manager/chrome_password_manager_client.cc;l=1347;drc=00053fb4d880a925c890193b74a8ff35e1cef2a0"><!---->https://source.chromium.org/chromium/chromium/src/+/master:chrome/browser/password_manager/chrome_password_manager_client.cc;l=1347;drc=00053fb4d880a925c890193b74a8ff35e1cef2a0<!----></a><br><br><br>VERSION<b class="line"><!---->VERSION<!----></b><br>Chrome Version: stable<span class="line"><!---->Chrome Version: stable<!----></span><br>Operating System: Linux<span class="line"><!---->Operating System: Linux<!----></span><br><br><br>REPRODUCTION CASE<b class="line"><!---->REPRODUCTION CASE<!----></b><br>1. Copy a lot of content(I used about 300M) from a non-chrome window.<span class="line"><!---->1. Copy a lot of content(I used about 300M) from a non-chrome window.<!----></span><br>2. $ python -m SimpleHTTPServer<span class="line"><!---->2. $ python -m SimpleHTTPServer<!----></span><br>   $ out/asan/chrome --user-data-dir=/tmp/xxxx "<span class="line"><!---->   $ out/asan/chrome --user-data-dir=/tmp/xxxx "<!----></span>http://localhost:8000/poc.html<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="http://localhost:8000/poc.html"><!---->http://localhost:8000/poc.html<!----></a>"<span class="line"><!---->"<!----></span><br>3. Click the input field and press Ctrl-V to paste.<span class="line"><!---->3. Click the input field and press Ctrl-V to paste.<!----></span><br><br><br>FOR CRASHES, PLEASE INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING ADDITIONAL INFORMATION<b class="line"><!---->FOR CRASHES, PLEASE INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING ADDITIONAL INFORMATION<!----></b><br>Type of crash: browser<span class="line"><!---->Type of crash: browser<!----></span><br>Crash State: see asan file<span class="line"><!---->Crash State: see asan file<!----></span><br><br><br>CREDIT INFORMATION<b class="line"><!---->CREDIT INFORMATION<!----></b><br>Reporter credit: Leecraso and Guang Gong of 360 Alpha Lab<span class="line"><!---->Reporter credit: Leecraso and Guang Gong of 360 Alpha Lab<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

        The content of <span class="line"><!---->The content of <!----></span>https://bugs.chromium.org/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1161146#c5<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://bugs.chromium.org/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1161146#c5"><!---->https://bugs.chromium.org/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=1161146#c5<!----></a> :<span class="line"><!----> :<!----></span><br><br> >    The nested message loop occurs in the pasting between different windows, so you can first use the mojo interface of the clipboard to fill the clipboard, and then close the browser (which can be achieved through window.close() or some crash). When the user restarts the browser, the browser is in a different window, so you can continue Step3.<span class="line"><!----> &gt;    The nested message loop occurs in the pasting between different windows, so you can first use the mojo interface of the clipboard to fill the clipboard, and then close the browser (which can be achieved through window.close() or some crash).         This bug requires manual review: We are only 3 days from stable.<span class="line"><!---->This bug requires manual review: We are only 3 days from stable.<!----></span><br>Before a merge request will be considered, the following information is required to be added to this bug:<span class="line"><!---->Before a merge request will be considered, the following information is required to be added to this bug:<!----></span><br><br>1. Does your merge fit within the Merge Decision Guidelines?<span class="line"><!---->1. Does your merge fit within the Merge Decision Guidelines?<!----></span><br>- Chrome: <span class="line"><!---->- Chrome: <!----></span>https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge"><!---->https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/src.git/+/master/docs/process/merge_request.md#when-to-request-a-merge<!----></a><br>- Chrome OS: <span class="line"><!---->- Chrome OS: <!----></span>https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines"><!---->https://goto.google.com/cros-release-branch-merge-guidelines<!----></a><br>2. Links to the CLs you are requesting to merge.<span class="line"><!---->2. Links to the CLs you are requesting to merge.<!----></span><br>3. Has the change landed and been verified on ToT?<span class="line"><!---->3. Has the change landed and been verified on ToT?<!----></span><br>4. Does this change need to be merged into other active release branches (M-1, M+1)?<span class="line"><!---->4. Does this change need to be merged into other active release branches (M-1, M+1)?<!----></span><br>5. Why are these changes required in this milestone after branch?<span class="line"><!---->5. Why are these changes required in this milestone after branch?<!----></span><br>6. Is this a new feature?<span class="line"><!---->6. Is this a new feature?<!----></span><br>7. If it is a new feature, is it behind a flag using finch?<span class="line"><!---->7. If it is a new feature, is it behind a flag using finch?<!----></span><br><br>Chrome OS Only:<span class="line"><!---->Chrome OS Only:<!----></span><br>8. Was the change reviewed and approved by the Eng Prod Representative? See Eng Prod ownership by component: <span class="line"><!---->8. Was the change reviewed and approved by the Eng Prod Representative? See Eng Prod ownership by component: <!----></span>http://go/cros-engprodcomponents<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="http://go/cros-engprodcomponents"><!---->http://go/cros-engprodcomponents<!----></a><br><br>Please contact the milestone owner if you have questions.<span class="line"><!---->Please contact the milestone owner if you have questions.<!----></span><br>Owners: govind@(Android), bindusuvarna@(iOS), marinakz@(ChromeOS), srinivassista @(Desktop)<span class="line"><!---->Owners: govind@(Android), bindusuvarna@(iOS), marinakz@(ChromeOS), srinivassista @(Desktop)<!----></span><br><br>For more details visit <span class="line"><!---->For more details visit <!----></span>https://www.chromium.org/issue-tracking/autotriage<a class="undefined" target="_blank" href="https://www.chromium.org/issue-tracking/autotriage"><!---->https://www.chromium.org/issue-tracking/autotriage<!----></a> - Your friendly Sheriffbot<span class="line"><!----> - Your friendly Sheriffbot<!----></span><mr-comment-content></mr-comment-content>

           issue<h3 class="medium-heading"><!----> issue</h3>
          
            Target project:<label for="targetProjectInput">Target project:</label>
            
              <input id="targetProjectInput" aria-owns="chops-autocomplete-1" aria-autocomplete="both" aria-expanded="false" aria-haspopup="listbox" aria-activedescendant="">
              
      
        /*
         * Really specific class names are necessary because ShadowDOM
         * is disabled for this component.
         */
        .chops-autocomplete-container {
          position: relative;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container table {
          padding: 0;
          font-size: var(--chops-main-font-size);
          color: var(--chops-link-color);
          position: absolute;
          background: var(--chops-white);
          border: var(--chops-accessible-border);
          z-index: 999;
          box-shadow: 2px 3px 8px 0px hsla(0, 0%, 0%, 0.3);
          border-spacing: 0;
          border-collapse: collapse;
          /* In the case when the autocomplete extends the
           * height of the viewport, we want to make sure
           * there's spacing. */
          margin-bottom: 1em;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tbody {
          display: block;
          min-width: 100px;
          max-height: 500px;
          overflow: auto;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr {
          cursor: pointer;
          transition: background 0.2s ease-in-out;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container tr[data-selected] {
          background: var(--chops-active-choice-bg);
          text-decoration: underline;
        }
        .chops-autocomplete-container td {
          padding: 0.25em 8px;
          white-space: nowrap;
        }
        .screenreader-hidden {
          clip: rect(1px, 1px, 1px, 1px);
          height: 1px;
          overflow: hidden;
          position: absolute;
          white-space: nowrap;
          width: 1px;
        }

 runOnLoad(function() {
 if (typeof(ClientLogger) === "function") {
 let cl = new ClientLogger("issues");
 if (cl.started("new-issue")) {
 cl.logEnd("new-issue", null, 120 * 1000);
 }
 if (cl.started("issue-search")) {
 cl.logEnd("issue-search");
 }
 }
 });
<script type="text/javascript" nonce="">
 runOnLoad(function() {
 if (typeof(ClientLogger) === "function") {
 let cl = new ClientLogger("issues");
 if (cl.started("new-issue")) {
 cl.logEnd("new-issue", null, 120 * 1000);
 }
 if (cl.started("issue-search")) {
 cl.logEnd("issue-search");
 }
 }
 });
</script>
